# dcurves

I wrote a Python package that evaluates binary and survival models. It has been downloaded 25k+ times.

-   [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/dcurves/), [GitHub](https://github.com/MSKCC-Epi-Bio/dcurves){.uri}, [Download Stats](https://pepy.tech/projects/dcurves){.uri}

# bioeq

I wrote a Python package to run PK/PD calculations for bioequivalence analysis in phase 1 clinical trials.

-   [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/bioeq/), [GitHub](https://github.com/juntotechnologies/bioeq)

# funcshauns

I wrote a Python package to house functions I use in accordance with the DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principle.

-   [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/funcshauns/), [GitHub](https://github.com/shaunporwal/funcshauns)
